job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The individual is required to plan, implement and deliver properly engineered high quality IT services and products which meet the needs of the client. The individual should be able to advise and consult where they see possibility for improvement on delivery related to the project. Accustomed to handle multiple projects and deliver on-time.

   Typical examples of the deliverables are building proof-of-concept solutions with server system technology and architecting server solutions to address client requirements

   Keep knowledge up to date with certification needed for the role at the specific client, Azure, Redhat, Automation.
job_details.full_text:
Linux Engineer

The individual is required to plan, implement and deliver properly engineered high quality IT services and products which meet the needs of the client. The individual should be able to advise and consult where they see possibility for improvement on delivery related to the project. Accustomed to handle multiple projects and deliver on-time.

   Typical examples of the deliverables are building proof-of-concept solutions with server system technology and architecting server solutions to address client requirements

   Keep knowledge up to date with certification needed for the role at the specific client, Azure, Redhat, Automation.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional IT infrastructure and service delivery, with no mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. The tasks described are typical of a systems administrator or infrastructure engineer, not an AI-focused role.

phrases.phrase: meet the needs of the client
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of client requirements and aligning technical delivery with business objectives.

phrases.phrase: advise and consult where they see possibility for improvement on delivery related to the project
phrases.justification: This highlights the ability to understand project delivery and suggest improvements, linking technical work to business outcomes.

phrases.phrase: building proof-of-concept solutions with server system technology
phrases.justification: While not traditional application development, building proof-of-concept solutions involves creating functional systems, which aligns with software development principles in an infrastructure context.
This involves designing and building technical solutions, which is a form of software/system development.

phrases.phrase: implement and deliver properly engineered high quality IT services and products
phrases.justification: This implies a focus on the operational aspects of delivering and maintaining IT services, akin to DevOps principles but not specifically MLOps.
Automation is a key component of operations engineering and MLOps, focusing on streamlining processes.

phrases.phrase: advise and consult where they see possibility for improvement on delivery related to the project
Keep knowledge up to date with certification needed for the role at the specific client
plan, implement and deliver properly engineered high quality IT services and products
architecting server solutions to address client requirements
Accustomed to handle multiple projects and deliver on-time
